text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After claiming her first win as part of<n>Team Sirius, Silence
Suzuka's<n>conquest begins...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's at it again! Silence Suzuka's<n>unstoppable! The rest of
the pack<n>can't catch up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Farther, farther, and farther still! With<n>runaway speed,
Silence Suzuka nabs<n>her second graded race win in a row!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Wheeze!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wheeze! ... I can't keep up withthat speed of yours!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But what can I do? My normal pace is<n>too slow, and there's
no way I can<n>catch up at the end... Hnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
One more! One more race! Come on,<n>Suzuka, Spe! Let's
gooo!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right, fine by me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! Can't we at least take a<n>five-minute break?!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: She flies down the course right fromthe start, and then sheaccelerates at the end too! What anamazing racer, that Silence Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I can't wait to see what she'll<n>bring to her next race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well, well, well, Suzuka's really made<n>a name for herself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Her winning streak certainly is<n>newsworthy, but her running
style<n>itself seems to be the bigger topic.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes... Although her front running isn't<n>like normal front
running. It's<n>something all her own.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Just as people's personalities differ,<n>so too does the
running of<n>Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I utilize my stamina to make a move<n>quickly. I can go from
fifth place to first<n>in an instant.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As for Brian, she can maintain her<n>speed for a long period
of time. She<n>conserves her strength until the<n>homestretch,
when she lets loose an<n>explosion of speed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And Rice... She uses her innate<n>stamina in a long spurt to
completely<n>dominate her opponents.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
All of us took time to determine our<n>own strengths and find
a running<n>strategy that utilizes them the best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Conversely, Suzuka's running is<n>more of an ideal than a
strategy—one<n>most of us have written off as<n>impossible.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Jetting out of the starting gate andthen racing down the course unrivaleddoes sound like a dream.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Jetting out of the starting gate andthen racing down the course unrivaleddoes sound like a dream.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yeah, and Suzuka's actually making<n>that dream a reality.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can only hope that we keep seeing<n>that running of hers. I
love watching<n>her make the impossible possible.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her running doesn't just mesmerize<n>fans, but racers too.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The scenery she seeks is dreamed of<n>by all Umamusume,
and they want to<n>see her achieve her goal as much as<n>
she does.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I hope I'm not intruding.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What's wrong? Did you forget<n>something?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What's wrong? Did you forget<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No. I was just wondering if my next<n>race has been decided.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Knowing my next race will give me a<n>goal to work towards
in training, and<n>um... I'm sure there are other<n>advantages.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka isn't usually the one<n>to bring up her next
race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Perhaps this is another sign of her<n>growth.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I was thinking we could aim for the<n>Kinko Sho next.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I was thinking we could aim for the<n>Kinko Sho next.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The Kinko Sho... I believe that one's<n>2,000 meters.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yup. I understand if that distance<n>worries you, considering
you run your<n>races at full speed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yup. I understand if that distance<n>worries you, considering
you run your<n>races at full speed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But that doesn't mean<n>medium-distance is impossible.<n>
Personally, I think you can handle it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But that doesn't mean<n>medium-distance is impossible.<n>
Personally, I think you can handle it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
If you believe in me that strongly, how<n>could I ever be
worried?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I'm curious to see how far<n>my running style can
take me, and this<n>could be my chance to find out.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you've been making good<n>progress in training
already. Trying<n>new things will only help you grow<n>more!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
If you can do well in the Kinko Sho,<n>you might even be able
to take on the<n>Takarazuka Kinen or the autumn<n>Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
If you can do well in the Kinko Sho,<n>you might even be able
to take on the<n>Takarazuka Kinen or the autumn<n>Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: G1 races...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Exciting, right? But that means your<n>training will be that
much more<n>intense.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe... That's fine by me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I want to explore my current<n>style as much as I can.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Something tells me... the scenery from<n>that path will be the
most beautiful of<n>all.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I'll be right alongside you. I can't<n>wait to get a view of
you achieving<n>your dream.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I'll be right alongside you. I can't<n>wait to get a view of
you achieving<n>your dream.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'll push myself to the limit. Then...<n>we'll both see the
scenery we seek.
